General.Name: European Lithium Limited
General.Description: European Lithium Limited explores for and develops lithium deposits in Austria. The company focuses on the development of the Wolfsberg lithium project that consists of 22 original and 32 overlapping exploration licenses, and a mining license covering 11 mining areas located in Carinthia. European Lithium Limited is headquartered in West Leederville, Australia.
General.Address: 32 Harrogate Street, West Leederville, WA, Australia, 6007
